<details>
<summary>English</summary>

This is not a final version, but a continuous one based on the main branch for testing purpose.

## Environment Requirements

- Eclipse IDE: 2024-12 (4.34) or newer
- Operating System: Linux
- Processor Architecture: riscv64, aarch64 and x86_64

## Installation Methods

1. In an empty directory, download and extract all files from `ruyisdk-eclipse-plugins.site.tar.gz`
1. Install "RuyiSDK IDE Feature" from a "Software Site" with the following information
    - Name: `RuyiSDK Updates (Local)`
    - Location: `file:///dir/path/`. Where `file://` is the protocol，and `/dir/path/` is the absolute path to the directory from the previous step

## Need Help?

If you have any questions:

- Ask questions in this repository: https://github.com/ruyisdk/ruyisdk-eclipse-plugins/issues
- Create posts in "RISC-V Developer Community": https://ruyisdk.cn/

## File List

```
%FILE_LIST%
```

## See Also

- RuyiSDK VSCode plugin: [GitHub](https://github.com/ruyisdk/ruyisdk-vscode-extension) and Visual Studio Marketplace <!-- TODO: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName= -->
- RuyiSDK official website: https://ruyisdk.org/
- Eclipse Help Documentation
    - [Adding a New Software Site](https://help.eclipse.org/topic/org.eclipse.platform.doc.user/tasks/tasks-127.htm)
    - [Updating the Installation](https://help.eclipse.org/topic/org.eclipse.platform.doc.user/tasks/tasks-120.htm)

</details>

<details open>
<summary>中文</summary>

这不是最终版本，而是通过持续集成环境在主分支更新时自动构建出来的测试版本。

## 环境要求

- Eclipse IDE: 2024-12 (4.34) 及更新版本
- 操作系统: Linux
- 处理器架构: riscv64、aarch64、x86_64

## 安装方法

1. 将 `ruyisdk-eclipse-plugins.site.tar.gz` 下载到一个空文件夹内并将其中的所有文件提取出来
1. 添加包含如下内容的 "Software Site" 并从中安装 "RuyiSDK IDE Feature"
    - Name: `RuyiSDK Updates (Local)`
    - Location: `file:///dir/path/`。其中 `file://` 是协议，`/dir/path/` 是上一步中的文件夹的绝对路径

## 需要帮助？

若有问题，您可以：

- 在本代码仓库提问: https://github.com/ruyisdk/ruyisdk-eclipse-plugins/issues
- 在 "RISC-V 开发者社区" 发帖: https://ruyisdk.cn/

## 文件列表

```
%FILE_LIST%
```

## 另请参阅

- RuyiSDK VSCode 插件: [GitHub](https://github.com/ruyisdk/ruyisdk-vscode-extension)、Visual Studio 市场 <!-- TODO: https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName= -->
- RuyiSDK 官方网站: https://ruyisdk.org/
- Eclipse 帮助文档
    - [Adding a New Software Site](https://help.eclipse.org/topic/org.eclipse.platform.doc.user/tasks/tasks-127.htm)
    - [Updating the Installation](https://help.eclipse.org/topic/org.eclipse.platform.doc.user/tasks/tasks-120.htm)

---

</details>
